10.5



```{r}
library(copula)
library(tidyverse)
data(loss)
library(readr)


DATOS <- read.table("~/GitHub/II-2022/Distribución de pérdidas/DATOS.txt", dec=",", quote="\"")


DATOS <- data.frame(Loss = c(DATOS$Loss1, DATOS$Loss2), ALAE = c(DATOS$ALAE1, DATOS$ALAE2))


(rhoTau <- cor(DATOS, method = "kendall")[1,2])

(theta2<-iTau(copula=gumbelCopula(), tau=rhoTau))

(theta <- 1/(1-rhoTau  ))


copulaGumbel <- fitCopula(copula = gumbelCopula(param = ), data = DATOS)
```
